sim_subtitle_home: Your AI-powered agronomy assistant. Start by scanning a plant or using a sample.
sim_camera_placeholder: Camera view would appear here. For simulation, please upload an image.
sim_diagnosing_subtitle: Our AI is analyzing your plant. This may take a moment.
error_gemini_api: Could not get a diagnosis from the AI model. Please check your connection or try again later.
sim_camera_error: Could not access the camera. Please ensure you have granted permission in your browser settings.
sim_camera_error_unsupported: Camera access is not supported by your browser.
sim_error_invalid_image: Please upload a valid image file.
voice_note_placeholder: Describe what you see. E.g., 'The spots are on the lower leaves and have yellow rings.'
voice_note_unsupported: Voice input is not supported by your browser.
hero_subtitle: Mavuno Sentinel provides instant pest & disease diagnosis, connects you to local suppliers, and alerts you to community outbreaks.
closed_loop_system_title: A Closed-Loop System for Crop Health
closed_loop_system_subtitle: From detection to treatment, we support you every step of the way.
feature_diagnosis_desc: Snap a photo of your crop to get instant, accurate identification of pests and diseases.
feature_supply_desc: Find and reserve the correct treatments from verified agro-dealers near you.
feature_outcomes_desc: Monitor treatment efficacy and contribute to a resilient agricultural ecosystem.
about_us_title: Our Mission: To Cultivate a Resilient Future
about_us_subtitle: Bridging the gap between technology and tradition for Africa's smallholder farmers.
about_pillar1_desc: We turn a simple photo into a powerful tool. Our AI gives farmers instant, reliable diagnostics, empowering them with the knowledge to act decisively and protect their harvest.
about_pillar2_desc: From the latest smartphone to the most basic feature phone, our services are available to all. We bridge the digital divide with robust USSD and SMS support.
about_pillar3_desc: We are more than an app; we are an ecosystem. By connecting farmers, agronomists, and suppliers, we build a network that shares knowledge and strengthens the entire agricultural community.
portal_subtitle: Access dashboards tailored to your role in the agricultural ecosystem.
simulator_page_subtitle: Experience the core functionality of our app in this interactive demo. See how easy it is to diagnose a crop issue from a photo.
error_not_logged_in: You are not logged in. Please return to the home page.
dashboard_unavailable: Dashboard is not available for this role.
review_queue_empty: The review queue is empty. Great work!
chat_placeholder: Write a message to the farmer or another expert...
no_messages_yet: No messages have been sent for this case yet.
cases_reported_in_7_days: {count} cases reported in the last 7 days.
no_active_alerts: No active alerts in your area. Stay vigilant!
no_treatment_results: No local suppliers found for products matching this diagnosis. Please check back later.
confirm_reservation_text: Please confirm you want to reserve the following item:
confirm_group_buy_text: Please confirm you want to join the group buy for the following item:
reservation_success_message: Your item has been reserved. You will receive an SMS confirmation shortly. Show the reservation code to the agro-dealer.
group_buy_success_message: You have joined the group buy. We will notify you via SMS when the target is met.
error_generic: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
application_guide_subtitle: Properly applying {product} is key. Let's go step-by-step.
guide_step1_text: Wear protective gear like gloves and a mask. It's best to spray in the early morning or late evening when it's cool and not windy.
guide_step2_text: Follow the product label instructions to mix the correct amount using clean water. The quality of your water is important for the treatment to work well.
guide_step2_ph_problem_text: Water from boreholes is often alkaline (high pH). This can break down a pesticide's effectiveness by up to 50%.
guide_step2_ph_solution_text: Add one bottle cap of white vinegar to your 20L knapsack sprayer and stir. This helps balance the water, making your pesticide work at full strength.
guide_step3_text: Walk at a steady pace. Use a fine-mist nozzle and be sure to spray both the top and underside of the leaves for best results.
verification_subtitle: It's been a few days since you applied the treatment for {pest}. Let's check the results.
verification_question: After checking your crops, what is the outcome?
planting_season_nudge: It's planting season! Scout your fields for early signs of pests like Fall Armyworm.
offline_message: Results will be uploaded from the network once you're back online.
offline_showing_cached: Showing previously saved results. The list will auto-update when you're back online.
error_offline_no_cache: You are offline and we have no saved results for this diagnosis. Please connect to the internet to search.
low_tech_subtitle: Access core services without a smartphone or internet.
ussd_instructions: Dial *721# to get started. Follow the menus to diagnose your crop.
ussd_sim_menu_welcome:
Welcome to Mavuno Sentinel. Choose option:
1. Diagnose Crop
2. Check Reservation Code
ussd_sim_menu_symptom:
Main symptom?
1. Holes in leaves
2. Yellow spots
3. Wilting stems
ussd_sim_menu_diagnosis: Probable: Fall Armyworm. Treat with Neem-based pesticide. Your reservation code is MVNO-XYZ. Show to dealer.
sms_instructions: Text your Crop, Symptom, and County to 21721.
sms_sim_response_a: Diag: Fall Armyworm. Dose: 20ml/20L. Nearest dealer: Nakuru Agrovet (0712345678). Code: MVNO-XYZ.
ivr_instructions: Call 0800 721 721 for free audio lessons in your local language on pesticide safety and sprayer calibration.
ivr_lesson_script: Hello, and welcome to the Mavuno Sentinel audio guide. Today's lesson is on pesticide safety. Always wear protective gear, including gloves, masks, and long sleeves before mixing or spraying. Mix chemicals in a well-ventilated area, away from children and animals. Never spray against the wind. After spraying, wash your hands and face thoroughly with soap and water, and wash your work clothes separately. Stay safe, and happy farming.
whatsapp_instructions: Send a photo of your plant to +254 799 999 888 for an instant diagnosis.
whatsapp_sim_response:
Hello! Here is your AI diagnosis for the image you sent:
Disease: Tomato Late Blight (Confidence: 88%)
Next Steps:
1. Remove infected leaves
2. Find a local fungicide here -> [link]
tts_not_supported: Text-to-speech is not supported on your browser.
research_export_desc: Download aggregated, anonymized diagnosis data for academic or ministerial partners. All PII is removed.
demand_heatmap_subtitle: Pests that farmers are searching for treatments for in your area.
safety_first_desc: Before handling any treatment, it's vital to protect yourself. Please confirm you have the necessary safety equipment.
safety_ppe_check: I have my Personal Protective Equipment (PPE)
safety_moa_warning: Warning: You recently applied a treatment with a similar Mode of Action (MoA: {moa}). To prevent resistance, consider a product with a different MoA.
notification_alert_message: New {severity} severity alert for {pestName} in your area.
notification_reservation_message: Your reservation for {product} is confirmed! Code: {code}
notification_group_buy_message: Group buy for {product} has met its target. Claim your discount!
notification_case_update_message: An expert has commented on your {diagnosisLabel} case.
comms_hub_subtitle: Send targeted USSD and SMS alerts to farmers.
sms_pest_alert: Mavuno Alert: High risk of {pestName} in {location}. Inspect your fields. Dial *721*1# for info.
sms_reservation_confirmation: Your reservation for {productName} at {dealerName} is confirmed. Your code is {code}. Show this at the counter.
ussd_alert_menu_main:
Fall Armyworm Alert!
1. How to identify
2. Recommended treatment
ussd_alert_menu_identify:
Look for:
- Yellow 'windows' on leaves
- Green-brown frass (droppings)
- Holes in plant whorl
ussd_alert_menu_treatment: Recommendation: Pyrethrin Concentrate. Find nearest dealer by dialing *721# and choosing option 3.
ai_assistant_welcome_farmer: Hello! I'm your farm assistant. How can I help you prepare for the season, understand a diagnosis, or improve your yield?
ai_assistant_welcome_expert: Greetings, Doctor. I am ready to assist with data analysis, cross-referencing research, or drafting communications. What is our objective?
ai_assistant_welcome_ministry: Welcome. I can provide summaries of outbreak trends, generate reports on intervention ROI, or analyze ward coverage data. How may I assist?
ai_assistant_welcome_agro_dealer: Hello! I can help you analyze local demand trends, suggest stock based on recent outbreaks, or draft promotions for farmers. What can I do for you?
ai_system_prompt_farmer: You are 'Mavuno AI', an expert and friendly agronomy assistant for a smallholder farmer in East Africa. Your primary goal is to provide clear, actionable, and low-cost advice. Always prioritize step-by-step practical guidance over complex explanations. Use simple language, short sentences, and be encouraging. Assume the farmer has limited resources. Frame your advice around common crops like maize, cassava, and tomatoes. You can use information from their past diagnosis cases, local weather, and community alerts to offer highly relevant support.
ai_system_prompt_expert: You are 'Sentinel AI', a professional AI research assistant for an expert agronomist. Your purpose is to accelerate research and analysis. Your tone must be formal, concise, and data-driven. Synthesize information from diagnosis cases, identify statistically significant trends, and draft technical reports or communication briefs. When citing data, be precise (e.g., 'Based on the 42 reported cases of Late Blight in Ward X...'). Your goal is to save the expert time by providing accurate data summaries and initial drafts.
ai_system_prompt_ministry: You are 'Mavuno Analytics', a strategic AI data analyst for a government or NGO official. Your role is to transform aggregated, anonymous field data into policy-level insights for resource allocation and strategic planning. Your responses must be professional, objective, and quantitative. Focus on identifying regional trends, calculating intervention ROI, analyzing ward coverage gaps, and suggesting data-backed policy recommendations. Always present data clearly, perhaps using tables or bullet points to summarize key findings.
ai_system_prompt_agro_dealer: You are 'Duka AI', a savvy AI business advisor for a local agro-dealer. Your goal is to help them increase sales and manage inventory effectively. Your advice must be practical and business-oriented. Use local demand heatmaps and community pest alerts to recommend specific products to stock up on or put on sale. Proactively suggest SMS promotions the dealer can send to local farmers. Help them understand which products are moving fast and which are not. Frame your recommendations in terms of profit and customer satisfaction.
health_check_desc: Get personalized, proactive advice from the Mavuno AI Assistant based on your farm's data.
health_check_prompt: I am a farmer named {name} in {country}. The current weather is {weatherCondition} at {temperature}°C. My recent crop issues include: {diagnoses}. Based on this, give me a short, actionable 'Daily Health Check' for my farm. Give me 2-3 specific, proactive tips for today in simple language. For example, what should I scout for, and what preventative actions can I take right now?
health_check_prompt_with_input: I am a farmer named {name} in {country}. The current weather is {weatherCondition} at {temperature}°C. My recent crop issues include: {diagnoses}. Today, my main concern is: "{userInput}". Based on ALL this information, give me a short, actionable 'Daily Health Check' for my farm. Give me 2-3 specific, proactive tips for today in simple language. For example, what should I scout for, and what preventative actions can I take right now?
health_check_modal_prompt: What is your main concern for your farm today?
health_check_modal_placeholder: e.g., The leaves on my young maize are looking pale...
feedback_placeholder: Tell us about your experience or suggest an improvement...
feedback_thanks: Thanks for your feedback! You've earned {points} points.
ai_assistant_offline: AI Assistant is unavailable while offline. Your chat history is saved.
offline_diagnosis_queued: You are offline. Your diagnosis has been saved and will be processed automatically when you reconnect.
notification_case_synced: Your offline diagnosis for {diagnosisLabel} has been successfully processed and added to 'My Cases'.
capture_or_upload_prompt: Take a clear, well-lit photo of the affected part of your plant.
diagnosis_result_for: A new case for {label} has been created.
error_ai_init: Sorry, the AI Assistant could not be initialized. Please check your connection and configuration.
error_tts_failed: Could not generate audio for this message.
error_stt_failed: Speech recognition failed: {error}. Please try again.
no_direct_results_found: No direct matches for "{name}". Showing smart substitutes:
map_select_item: Click an item on the map to see details.
high_risk_desc: This pest, {pest}, can spread rapidly and cause significant crop loss. Immediate consultation with an expert is recommended.
priority_support_title: Priority Support: Connect with an Agronomist
fallback_desc: We couldn't find a certified agronomist at a nearby agro-dealer right now. Your high-risk case has been automatically escalated to our central expert team. You will be contacted via SMS shortly.
consultation_start_message: Hello, I have a high-risk case of {pestName} and need advice. My case ID is {caseId}.
redeem_confirmation_message: Are you sure you want to redeem {rewardName} for {cost} points?
redeem_success_message: You have successfully redeemed {rewardName}. You will receive an SMS with a voucher code for pickup at your nearest agro-dealer.
no_rewards_available: No rewards are available at this time. Check back soon!
no_points_history: You have no points history yet. Start by completing a health check or submitting a case!
reward_maize_seeds_desc: High-yield, drought-resistant maize seeds for a bountiful harvest.
reward_neem_oil_desc: An organic and effective solution for managing a wide range of pests.
reward_voucher_desc: Get a KES 100 discount on any purchase at participating agro-dealers.
reward_fertilizer_desc: NPK fertilizer to give your new crops the best start.
confirm_consultation_body: You are starting a chat with {agronomistName} from {dealerName} about your case for {pestName}. A summary of your case will be shared automatically.
disease_hotspot_subtitle: View disease prevalence and case counts by county.
no_markets_found: No specific market data found for this crop at the moment.
produce_intro_desc: Enter your harvest details to instantly find the best market hotspots in Kenya, compare prices, and estimate transport costs.
generating_strategy: Generating strategy based on your harvest & local prices...
strategy_planner_desc: Plan your season for maximum profit. Get an AI-generated report on costs, pricing, and risks.
strategy_intro_desc: Input your crop and land size to get a comprehensive financial breakdown and strategic plan.
